lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''The Return of Commissioner Kelly'' (editorial, Nov. 15): Raymond W. Kelly's résumé may ''inspire confidence'' in his capacity to lead the New York City Police Department at this very difficult time, but any plan to revive the community policing that he favors while continuing the war on quality-of-life offenses would be wrongheaded.
abstract: David T Johnson letter warns incoming Comr Raymond W Kelly against reviving community policing while continuing war on quality-of-life offenses in New York City (S)
